Package it.polimi.ingsw.model.board

Interface PlayerBoard

All Known Implementing Classes:
DecoratedChangePlayerBoard, DecoratedCostPlayerBoard, DecoratedPlayerBoard, DecoratedProductionPlayerBoard, DecoratedWarehousePlayerBoard, SimplePlayerBoard
public interface PlayerBoard
This interface represents a player board.

      Returns:

      boolean addWarehouseResource​(Resources resource, WarehousePositions row)
      Adds a resource to the warehouse
      Parameters:
      resource - Resource type to add
      row - Warehouse position [1,2,3]
      Returns:
      Success or failure of the addition.

      Parameters:

      newRowPosition - Desired row position after shift.
      Returns:
      Success or failure

    • getSubstitutableResources

      java.util.ArrayList<Resources> getSubstitutableResources()
      Gets all the indices of the resources that can be substituted. Similar to getSubstitutes() but the list size is the same length as the number of active substitutions.
      Returns:
      An array with the indices of the substitutable resources.

    • getResources

      java.util.ArrayList<Resources> getResources​(int choice, int temp)
      Gets a list with the type of resources contained in the strongbox, the warehouse or the special warehouse
      Parameters:
      choice - is to choose between warehouse, strongbox, or the special warehouse
      temp - is for exclude a resource from the count
      Returns:
      Gets a list with the type of resources contained
